Package group24.piazzapanic.maths

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
      • group24.piazzapanic.maths.Vector2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>, java.io.Serializable
    public class Vector2
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
    This class is a simple 2D vector class. It uses doubles so can store non-integers. Do not use with level elements, UI elements only.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static Vector2 gridUnitTranslate​(double gridX, double gridY)
      Creates an on-screen Vector2 from grid units, the parameters are translated to scale both x and y by Base.WINDOW_WIDTH, according the relative width of one tile, Base.TILE_GRID_UNIT.

      • gridUnitTranslate

        public static Vector2 gridUnitTranslate​(float gridX,
                                        float gridY)
        Creates an on-screen Vector2 from grid units, the parameters are translated to scale both x and y by Base.WINDOW_WIDTH, according the relative width of one tile, Base.TILE_GRID_UNIT.
        Parameters:
        gridX - The x position of a given cell in the grid.
        gridY - The y position of a given cell in the grid.
        Returns:
        A Vector2 referring to the position of the object on the screen.

      • gridUnitTranslate

        public static Vector2 gridUnitTranslate​(double gridX,
                                        double gridY)
        Creates an on-screen Vector2 from grid units, the parameters are translated to scale both x and y by Base.WINDOW_WIDTH, according the relative width of one tile, Base.TILE_GRID_UNIT.
        Parameters:
        gridX - The x position of a given cell in the grid.
        gridY - The y position of a given cell in the grid.
        Returns:
        A Vector2 referring to the position of the object on the screen.
